name: Young Amethyst Dragon
movement: walk 40 ft., burrow 20 ft., fly 60 ft.
description: A large dragon with potent psionic abilities and a sleek, amethyst-hued body.
memorable: Its ability to psionically observe creatures within 100 miles gives it a strategic edge.
goals: Typically seeks to control or manipulate situations using its intellect and psionic powers.
relations: May interact with other dragons or psionically-inclined creatures.
environment: Mountainous or cavernous regions where it can defend its territory.
strengths: Exceptional spellcasting abilities, strong physical attacks, and immunity to fatigue.
weaknesses: Susceptible to spells that can exploit psionic vulnerabilities.
attacks: Multiattack option allowing for a powerful bite and claw attacks with additional damage from its breath weapon.
most_powerful_ability: Concussive Breath that deals significant area force damage.
senses: Has a passive perception of 15, which enhances its awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Proficient in deception, insight, perception, and persuasion, allowing it to navigate social situations effectively.
additional_information: Resistant to force and psychic damage.
Innate spellcaster with Charisma as its spellcasting ability.
Ability to telepathically communicate within 120 feet.
Can observe psionic activities within a 100-mile radius.
Blind and deaf to its physical surroundings while using Far Thoughts.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting allowing it to cast calm emotions and charm person without components.
test_queries: creature that attacks with claws and bite
powerful dragon using force damage breath
